author: Simon Difford
description: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. Carefully POUR coffee liqueur into centre of the cocktail (it should sink to create a dark layer at the bottom of the cocktail).
name: The Vervet
recipeIngredient: 10 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
15 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
Carefully POUR coffee liqueur into centre of the cocktail (it should sink to create a dark layer at the bottom of the cocktail)
